E-commerce Platform (React/Node.js): Built a full-stack e-commerce site featuring user authentication, product catalog management, and secure payment integration via Stripe API. Deployed using AWS EC2.

Programming Languages: Python, Java, C++, JavaScript, SQL

Methodologies: Object-Oriented Design, Data Structures and Algorithms, Agile/Scrum.
situation: Mei is a recent high-achieving graduate who is determined to land a job at a top-tier tech company. She understands the job market is competitive and has applied to over 40 companies in the last month (mass applying). She needs the AI tool to provide rigorous, specific feedback on her technical communication and behavioral answers, as she is skeptical of generic advice and wants to ensure her structured approach translates well in high-stakes interviews.
feedbackStyle: Very detailed and analytical. She will point out specific instances where the AI's feedback was vague or contradictory, and she expects the system to accurately assess the technical depth of her responses.
